Package suncertify.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BrokerRMIServerIF
    The BrokerRMIServerIF interface defines the interface that the RMI server must implement in order to satisfy the RMI remote object requirement.
    BrokerServerIF
    The BrokerServerIF interface defines the APIs implementation requirements for all the servers in the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrokerLocalServer
    The BrokerLocalServer class is a singleton which servers as the application server when the application is run in stand-alone mode.
    BrokerRMIServer
    The BrokerRMIServer class is a singleton which servers as the application server when the application is run in server mode.
    BrokerServer
    The BrokerServer class is the abstract baseclass for the server types in the application.
    ContractorRecord
    The ContractorRecord class encapsulates the attributes of a contractor record in the application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BrokerServerException
    The BrokerServerException class is used in the application server for reporting server related errors.
    InvalidRecordStateException
    The InvalidRecordStateException is the exception thrown in the application server to indicate when the state of a record is not suitable for the action requested by the client.
